work-item.field:
Before we go on creating a new wiki page you should explore these API classes, their paramters and return values to get a feeling about their functionallity. Please take your time it might save you some time in the future.
Try some simple functions like:
  • $me
  • $page.project
  • $page.name
  • $platformService.polarionProductName
  • $platformService.polarionVersion
